function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious transmission of coronavirus from animal to human","Impact":"Large-scale outbreaks or epidemics","Mitigation":"Develop and enforce strict regulations for animal markets and animal handling practices","Technologies":"Surveillance systems for early detection, genomic sequencing for virus identification","People":"Animal market workers, caretakers, and handlers","Owner":"Government health departments"},{"Description":"Person-to-person transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus leading to a global pandemic","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing measures, widespread testing and contact tracing","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing apps, remote communication technologies","People":"General population, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Environmentally mediated transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of shared surfaces, promotion of hygienic practices in public spaces","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection, antimicrobial coatings for surfaces","People":"General population, individuals frequenting public areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility management"}]}
